list-item.p: Constant absorptivity: α 20 remains constant at its initial value, and there is neither plasticity nor evolution.
Observed plasticity: Plasticity occurs at its initial value, but neither α 20 nor B evolves.
Evolution of absorptivity: α 20 evolves, but there is neither plasticity nor evolution of plasticity.
Evolution with observed plasticity: α 20 evolves, and plasticity is fixed at its initial value.
Evolution of plasticity: Both α 20 and B evolve.
Perfect plasticity: The optimal absorptivity (α opt) is expressed in each generation each year.
